bridge-type.label: Elero Transmitter Stick
bridge-type.description: Thing for an Elero Transmitter Stick

parameter.name: portName
parameter.label: Port Name
parameter.description: The name of the port to which the Elero Transmitter Stick is connected.

parameter.name: updateInterval
parameter.label: Update Interval
parameter.description: The number of seconds to wait before requesting the status of the elero channels from the Elero Transmitter Stick.

thing-type.label: Elero Channel
thing-type.description: One of the 15 elero channels available on an Elero Transmitter Stick.

thing-type.label: Elero Channel Group
thing-type.description: A group of one or more channels. Can be used to send the same command to different channels simultaneously.

parameter.name: channelids
parameter.label: Channel IDs
parameter.description: Comma separated list of channel ids.

channel-type.label: Control
channel-type.description: Allows to control the devices connected to this elero channel or group by sending UP, DOWN, STOP commands.

channel-type.label: Status
channel-type.description: Read only channel providing the current status of this elero channel or group.
